subject: Q4 Project Deadline - Important
body: Hi team, we need to finalize the Q4 project by Friday. Please send your updates by EOD tomorrow. This is critical for our quarterly goals.

subject: Sunday Dinner Plans
body: Hi sweetie, just wanted to confirm dinner plans for Sunday. Dad is making his famous lasagna! Can you bring dessert?

subject: URGENT: You've Won $1,000,000!!!
body: Congratulations! You have won our grand prize lottery! Click here immediately to claim your winnings before they expire!

subject: Employee Benefits Update
body: Dear employees, we are updating our health insurance benefits for 2025. Please review the attached documents and submit your selections by June 15th.

subject: 50% OFF Everything! Limited Time!
body: Don't miss out on our biggest sale of the year! Everything is 50% off for the next 24 hours only. Shop now before it's too late!

subject: Weekend Hiking Trip
body: Hey! Want to join us for a hiking trip this weekend? We're planning to hit the mountain trails early Saturday morning. Let me know if you're interested!
